heading: HB00479
0: AN ACT INSTITUTING A NATIONAL DAM SAFETY PROGRAM, ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL DAM SAFETY AUTHORITY, PENALIZING VIOLATIONS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-05-17
          -TWG created for all bills proposing to create a central body for the water sector, to be chaired by Rep. Herrera-Dy
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-07
          -1st TWG meeting, members instructed secretariat to request with the Committee on Rules to jointly refer water bills with the Committees on Public Works and Highways and Govt Reorganization (as primary committee)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2017-02-08
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS on 2016-07-26;
